*"We’re entering a new world in which data may be more important than software."*

— Tim O’Reilly

### `The Journey`

Welcome to ISSS608, your journey through visual analytics and applications. In this course, you'll explore innovative tools and techniques that make data visual, interactive, and actionable. We delve into case studies, engage in hands-on exercises, and collaborate on projects that enhance your ability to analyze complex data sets and communicate findings effectively.
